agency_name: SAINT PETERS UNITED CHURCH OF CHRIST PARKER SETTLEMENT
agency_desc: A church with outreach programs including a food pantry.
site_name: SAINT PETERS UNITED CHURCH OF CHRIST PARKER SETTLEMENT
service_description: Provides nonperishable food to persons in need, limited service area.
site_details: Call to complete application.
site_eligibility: Living in Posey County.

agency_desc: A collection of services offered by Posey County government offices.
service_description: Provides information about and assistance with veterans' benefits to veterans, their surviving spouses, and their children. County service officers can assist in the completion and submission of forms necessary to receive all appropriate federal and state veterans' benefits.
site_details: Call to schedule an appointment.
site_eligibility: Veterans and surviving spouses or children of veterans

agency_desc: A collection of services offered by Posey County government offices.
service_description: Provides law enforcement, crime prevention, and criminal investigation services and maintains the Posey County correctional institution used to detain persons who are in lawful custody, including accused persons awaiting trial and those who have been convicted of a crime and are serving a sentence of less than one year. Operates a 24-hour dispatch service for police officers, firefighters, and medics (ambulances). A ten-digit dispatch number is provided for non-emergency dispatch calls. For emergency assistance, persons should call 9-1-1.
site_details: Call 9-1-1 for emergency police, fire, or medical assistance. For nonemergency requests or reports, call the office during normal business hours. nonemergency dispatch number.
site_eligibility: Serves Posey County -- To visit jail: Must be on the inmate's approved visitor list and be age 18 or older (or accompanied by someone over 18 who is also on the inmate's visitor list)

agency_desc: An elected official responsible for administering the township, including such duties as providing township assistance, burial of the indigent, and maintaining the township budget.
service_description: May be able to assist township residents who are experiencing an unexpected crisis with basic needs, such as:  Essential utilities -- Burial/Cremation expenses -- Housing expense -- Work/Medical transportation -- Food/Clothing -- Necessary medications/medical care assistance is at the discretion of the trustee. Denials can be appealed to the county commissioner; information on appealing is included in the denial letter.

nameLevel4: Prescription Drugs for Specific Health Conditions

agency_desc: A nonprofit agency dedicated to improving the life of older adults.
site_name: POSEY COUNTY COUNCIL ON AGING - MOUNT VERNON
service_description: Provides homemaker services, including light housekeeping and errand/shopping assistance, to Posey County seniors and persons with disabilities who are unable to perform the tasks themselves.
site_details: Call or walk in for information.
site_eligibility: Living in Posey County -- Seniors, age 55 or older -OR- Persons of any age with a disability
Living in Posey County -- Age 55 or older
Living in Posey County -- Seniors, age 55 or older -OR- Persons of any age with a disability -OR- Persons of any age with full Medicaid

agency_desc: A nonprofit agency dedicated to improving the life of older adults.
site_name: POSEY COUNTY COUNCIL ON AGING - POSEYVILLE
service_description: Offers social, recreational, and educational activities for Posey County seniors. Programming generally includes exercise classes, cards and games, blood pressure checks, and trips.
site_details: Visit the website, call, or walk in for information.
site_eligibility: Living in Posey County -- Age 55 or older
Living in Posey County -- Seniors, age 55 or older -OR- Persons of any age with a disability

agency_desc: A nonprofit agency dedicated to improving the life of older adults.
site_name: POSEY COUNTY COUNCIL ON AGING - NEW HARMONY
service_description: Offers social, recreational, and educational activities for Posey County seniors. Programming generally includes exercise classes, cards and games, blood pressure checks, and trips.
site_details: Visit the website, call, or walk in for more information.
site_eligibility: Living in Posey County -- Age 55 or older
Living in Posey County -- Seniors, age 55 or older -OR- Persons of any age with a disability

agency_desc: A government agency that provides public health nursing, works to control the spread of communicable disease, investigates environmental hazards, and maintains vital records for the county.
service_description: Provides low-cost or free immunizations for County youth (through age 18) who are uninsured, whose insurance does not cover the required vaccination, or who are enrolled in Medicaid. Also provides immunizations for American Indians and Alaskan Natives under age 18 regardless of their insurance status.
site_details: Call to schedule an appointment or for availability of walk-in hours.
site_eligibility: Living in withiin the County -- Age 2 months through 18 years -- Without health insurance -OR- insurance does not cover needed vaccine (including coverage that has capped out) -OR- insured through Medicaid -OR- American Indian or Alaskan Native, regardless of insurance status

agency_desc: A government agency that provides public health nursing, works to control the spread of communicable disease, investigates environmental hazards, and maintains vital records for the county.
service_description: Provides routine health and safety inspections and investigates complaints against restaurants, grocery stores, and other food service establishments in the County. Provides consultation and licensing for retail food service vendors and food safety education for individuals, health fairs, and community groups.
site_details: Call to make a complaint about licensed food service establishments in the County or for details about licensing or food safety programs.
site_eligibility: Varies by service; serves Posey County
Varies by service; call for details.
Living in Posey County -- Age 6 months or older
Schools, community organizations, and other groups in the County
Open
Births/deaths occurring in the County -- Individual named on the birth certificate, parent, or other adult with a legal right to the certificate
Living in Posey County
Age 19 or older -- Living in Posey County

Living within the county -- Testing is recommended for any child 6 months through 6 years old who: Lives in or visits a building constructed before 1978 -Or- lives with someone who works with lead (such as a battery factory, steel smelter, stained glass) -OR- has a sibling or playmate who has been diagnosed with lead poisoning.

agency_desc: Coordinates emergency management programs and response measures in Posey County.
service_description: Offers training to prepare volunteers in Posey County to help themselves and others in the event of a disaster until trained emergency personnel arrive. Community Emergency Response Team (CERT) volunteers provide support by giving immediate assistance to victims, providing damage assessment information, and organizing other volunteers at a disaster site.
site_details: Call for more information.
site_eligibility: Persons who live or work in Posey County
Open
Living in Posey County -- Homeowners -- Mobile home occupants -- Low income

agency_desc: Provides access to fiction and non-fiction library materials to patrons of all ages.
service_description: Maintains a public lending library and provides phone-based reference assistance. In-house services include public computer and Internet access.
site_details: Walk in to apply for a library card, check out materials, or use in-house services. Call for information.
site_eligibility: Most in-house services, including computer stations: Open -- For a library card: Living in Posey County

agency_desc: A faith-based, nonprofit organization offering charitable outreach programs, including a clothing pantry, food pantry, and soup kitchen.
service_description: Provides perishable and nonperishable food and frozen meat to persons in need.
site_details: Walk in.
site_eligibility: Living in Posey County -- Not received food from this pantry within the past month
Open

agency_desc: A government organization that administers housing assistance programs.
service_description: Provides subsidized, income-based rental units in Mt Vernon to eligible families, seniors, and persons with disabilities. Applications to be placed on the wait list are currently being accepted.
site_details: Call for information.
site_eligibility: Low income -- US citizens and eligible immigrants -- Priority given to persons 50 or older or with disabilities
Household income below set limits -- Preference given to seniors, people with disabilities, Veterans, those working, homeless, victims of domestic violence, and local individuals.

agency_desc: A nonprofit humane society serving Posey County and surrounding areas.
service_description: Provides shelter for stray and unwanted animals in Posey County, rehomes animals through adoption, and offers lost-and-found services.
site_details: Call to make an appointment.

site_schedule.schedule: Mon, Tues, Wed, and Fri noon-5pm; Sat 10am-2pm

site_schedule.schedule: Mon, Tues, Wed, and Fri noon-5pm; Sat 10am-2pm

agency_name: METROPOLITAN SCHOOL DISTRICT OF MOUNT VERNON
agency_desc: Administers the elementary, middle, and high schools within the district.
site_name: METROPOLITAN SCHOOL DISTRICT OF MOUNT VERNON
service_description: Administers the elementary, middle, and high schools in this school district. Provides student transportation services and maintains information on school locations, enrollment, fees, and curricula. District provides information regarding special education services for students age 3-22 with disabilities.
site_details: Call for information about school assignments, transportation, or other issues. -- Contact the assigned school to enroll.
site_eligibility: Students living within the school district in grades K-12

agency_desc: A nonprofit, community-based food pantry providing families in need with a 2-3 day emergency supply of food.
service_description: Provides perishable and nonperishable food to those in need. Limited service area.
site_details: Walk in.

site_schedule.name: Commodity Supplemental Food Program
site_schedule.schedule: Sign-up: Mon, Wed, and Fri 9am-noon -- Distribution: Monthly 4th Wed 9am-noon

site_eligibility: Living in Posey County -- Limit one (1) visit per month

agency_desc: A faith-based nonprofit organization providing community outreach services, including a food pantry and limited financial assistance.
site_name: NEW HARMONY MINISTRY ASSOCIATION AT JOHNSON UNITED METHODIST CHURCH
service_description: Provides limited financial assistance with utilities (gas, electric, water) or rent for those in need. Assistance is provided on a case-by-case basis. Limited service area.
site_details: Call to schedule an appointment; leave voicemail with name, phone number, and type of assistance requested.
site_eligibility: Living in Posey County, north of Smith School Road

agency_desc: A County department that provides various recycling drop-off sites for those living in Posey County.
site_name: POSEY COUNTY SOLID WASTE MANAGEMENT - MOUNT VERNON
service_description: Maintains drop-off sites around Posey County for collecting recyclables including: Glass (all colors) -- Plastics (1, 2, and 5), no Styrofoam -- Aluminum, tin, and steel beverage and food cans -- Newspapers and magazines -- Plastic grocery bags  -- Cardboard -- Electronic devices taken at Mount Vernon site only --Appliances taken at Mount Vernon site only.
site_details: Call to find nearest location to drop off recyclables; remove all items from trash bags, before placing in bin.

site_schedule.name: Recycling Centers
site_schedule.schedule: Office: Mon-Fri 8am-4pm -- Drop-off: Vary by drop-off site

site_eligibility: Living in Posey County

agency_desc: Sells donated clothing, small appliances, and household goods.
service_description: Sells donated furniture, clothing, small appliances, toys, and other household goods at discounted prices.
site_details: Walk in.
site_eligibility: Open

agency_desc: Provides access to fiction and non-fiction library materials to patrons of all ages.
service_description: Maintains a public lending library for residents of Poseyville in Posey County. Circulates books, eBooks, periodicals, audio books, CDs, and DVDs. Provides phone-based reference assistance. In-house services include public computer and Internet access.
site_details: Walk in to apply for a library card, check out materials, or use in-house services. Call for information.

site_schedule.name: Public Internet Access Sites
site_schedule.schedule: Mon and Fri 9am-4pm; Tues and Thurs 9am-7pm; Wed 1pm-7pm; Sat 8am-noon

site_schedule.name: Public Libraries
site_schedule.schedule: Mon and Fri 9am-4pm; Tues and Thurs 9am-7pm; Wed 1pm-7pm; Sat 8am-noon

site_eligibility: Most in-house services, including computer stations: Open -- For a library card: Living in Bethel, Center, Robb, or Smith Township

agency_desc: A church offering worship services and charitable outreach programs.
service_description: Loans medical equipment to Posey County persons in need. Available items typically include hospital beds, wheelchairs, crutches, walkers, and similar equipment.
site_details: Call to schedule an appointment.
site_eligibility: Living in Posey County

agency_desc: The County Clerk maintains records of all civil and criminal court activities, passports, issues marriage licenses, child support collections, voter registration, and records state tax liens.
service_description: Serves as a voter registration site and provides information about voting, candidates, absentee voting, and volunteering to work the polls. Oversees county-level elections, candidate filings, and campaign finance.
site_details: Call for information -- Walk in or visit website to register

site_schedule.name: Child Support Assistance/Enforcement
site_schedule.schedule: Mon-Fri 8am-4pm -- Indiana Kids Line (Payment Information): Recorded information daily 24 hours; live assistance Mon-Fri 6am-5pm

site_eligibility: Registering to vote: United States citizen -- Age 18 by the day of the next election -- Not currently incarcerated -- To vote: Registered to vote a minimum of 29 days before the election
Parents ordered by the court to pay or receive child support

Marriage license: Both parties at least age 18 (call or visit website for exceptions) -- At least one applicant from this county -OR- both from out of state -- Certified copies: License must have been issued in this county
Varies by service; serves Posey County

agency_desc: Represents the state of Indiana in felony and misdemeanor criminal prosecutions, conducts criminal investigations, supervises Grand Jury proceedings, enforces child support orders, conducts juvenile adjudication and prosecution, enforces traffic violations, and provides information and assistance to victims of crime.
service_description: Represents the state of Indiana in all felony and misdemeanor criminal prosecutions resulting from crimes committed in Vanderburgh County. The prosecutor's office also conducts criminal investigations, supervises Grand Jury proceedings, enforces child support orders, conducts juvenile adjudication and prosecution, enforces traffic laws, and provides information and assistance to victims of crime.
site_details: Varies
site_eligibility: Open
Victims and witnesses of major crimes in Posey County

To File for Child Support Assistance -- Living in Posey County -- Parent, guardian, aunt, uncle, or grandparent who has physical custody of a child (ages 0-18) -- Requiring financial support from a noncustodial parent of the child

agency_desc: Serves as the executive and administrative authority for Posey County.
service_description: Serves as the executive and administrative authority for Posey County, including performing the following duties: Controls, maintains, and supervises county property -- Audits and authorizes claims against the county -- Receives bids for and authorizes county contracts -- Performs certain election functions -- Handles appeals of township trustee decisions
site_details: Call for assistance.

site_schedule.name: General Relief Appeals/Complaints
site_schedule.schedule: Office: Mon-Fri 8am-4pm -- Board Meetings: 1st and 3rd Tues 9am

site_schedule.name: Local Officials Offices
site_schedule.schedule: Office: Mon-Fri 8am-4pm -- Board Meetings: 1st and 3rd Tues 9am

site_eligibility: Varies by service

agency_desc: Serves as the state trial court for the county, hearing both civil and criminal cases.
service_description: Provides probation services for the Posey County Circuit and Superior Courts, including supervising juvenile and adult offenders in the community and linking them with programs and services to support their rehabilitation.
taxonomy_name: Criminal Record Expungement Petition Filing Offices
nameLevel4: Criminal Record Expungement Petition Filing Offices
site_details: Through the courts; call for information.

site_schedule.name: Criminal Record Expungement Petition Filing Offices

site_eligibility: Offenders assigned to probation by the Posey County Courts
Persons named in cases or called for jury duty at this court

agency_desc: Serves as the state trial court for the county, hearing both civil and criminal cases.
site_name: INDIANA STATE COURTS - SMALL CLAIMS COURT
service_description: Handles civil lawsuits for $6,000 or less, including contracts, collection of rent, evictions, and personal loans. Only corporations are required to be represented by an attorney and only on claims over $1,500. In Posey County, Superior Court handles small claims cases.
site_details: Walk in or visit the website for claim forms.
site_eligibility: To file a lawsuit: Age 18 or older -- With a civil claim for less than $6,000 -- Meeting one of the following three requirements: Person being sued lives or works in Posey County -- Matter resulting in lawsuit took place in Posey County -- Matter resulting in lawsuit was to be performed in Posey County

agency_desc: Government agency that locates, identifies, and appraises all taxable property in Posey County.
service_description: Calculates the value of all taxable property in Posey County, which is then used to assess taxes. Hears appeals of assessments, oversees reassessments, and maintains information on property descriptions and ownership.
site_details: Call or visit the website for more information.
site_eligibility: Varies by service; limited to taxable property in Posey County

agency_desc: A nonprofit organization that provides community outreach programs to promote economic and social self-sufficiency to those in need.
site_name: COMMUNITY ACTION PROGRAM OF EVANSVILLE - POSEY COUNTY
service_description: Provides nonperishable food to those in need. Diapers and baby formula may be available depending on funding. Limited service area.
site_details: May call to confirm eligibility and available types of food (not required).
site_eligibility: Living in Posey County -- Limit one visit every 30 days

agency_desc: A nonprofit organization that provides services to older adults and those who are disabled in a six county area.
site_name: SWIRCA & MORE MEAL SITE - CLOVERLEAF APARTMENTS
service_description: Provides nutritious, sit-down lunches five days each week for area seniors. Reservations are not required. Small donation requested.
site_details: Walk in.
site_eligibility: Age 60 or older (exceptions made for spouses and guests)
